document.full_text: paul splittorff, who won a club-record 166 games while spending his entire 15-year career with the royals, died on wednesday at 64.
document.title: royals legend paul splittorff dies at 64
lines_and_colors: paul splittorff, who won a club-record 166 games while spending his entire 15-year career with the royals, died on wednesday at 64.
